sonusSonetMIB.name: sonusSonetMIB
sonusSonetMIB.contactinfo: Customer Support Sonus Networks, Inc, 5 carlisle Road Westford, MA 01886 USA Tel: 978-692-8999 Fax: 978-392-9118 E-mail: cs.snmp@sonusnet.com
sonusSonetMIB.description: The MIB Module for Sonus SONET/SDH extensions.

sonusSonetPortAdmnTable.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnTable
sonusSonetPortAdmnTable.description: The Sonus SONET Port Admn Table.

sonusSonetPortAdmnEntry.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnEntry
sonusSonetPortAdmnEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Port Admn table.

sonusSonetPortAdmnIfIndex.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnIfIndex
sonusSonetPortAdmnIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetPortAdmnPortIndex.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnPortIndex
sonusSonetPortAdmnPortIndex.description: OC3 port index for this table.

sonusSonetPortAdmnRowStatus.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnRowStatus
sonusSonetPortAdmnRowStatus.description: This object is used to create, delete, or modify a row in this table.

sonusSonetPortAdmnMode.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnMode
sonusSonetPortAdmnMode.description: SONET port entries are created with a mode of outOfService. A SONET port which is outOfService has had all active calls terminated. A SOENT port must be outOfService in order to change its state to disabled.

sonusSonetPortAdmnAction.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnAction
sonusSonetPortAdmnAction.description: The type of action to perform when a SONET port is taken out of service. The SONET port can be dried up, or it can be forced out of service.

sonusSonetPortAdmnTimeout.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnTimeout
sonusSonetPortAdmnTimeout.description: The Dryup Timeout specifies the maximum amount of time to wait for all active calls to terminate on a SONET port before the port should be taken out-of-service.

sonusSonetPortAdmnStatAction.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnStatAction
sonusSonetPortAdmnStatAction.description: Initialize Performance Monitoring Statistics. A PM initialization action initiates one request for the action. Requests to initialize more than one group of statistics can be accomplished by OR-ing the appropriate bits (e.g., to initialize all 15 minute PM statistics, set bits 1 and 2). Reading this variable always returns zero.

sonusSonetPortAdmnLaserState.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnLaserState
sonusSonetPortAdmnLaserState.description: Controls whether the fiber-optic laser is On or Off.

sonusSonetPortAdmn24hTimeElapsed.name: sonusSonetPortAdmn24hTimeElapsed
sonusSonetPortAdmn24hTimeElapsed.description: The number of seconds, including partial seconds, that have elapsed since the beginning of the current 24 hour measurement period.

sonusSonetPortAdmnOperStatus.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnOperStatus
sonusSonetPortAdmnOperStatus.description: The actual status of the Sonet interface. Interface is Up if it is administratively in service and there are no line failures or hardware failures. Interface is Down if it is administratively in service and there are line failures or hardware failures, or if it is administratively out of service. Interface is DryingUp if it is administratively out of service and is drying up (no new calls, still carrying in-progress calls). OTHER VALUES ARE NO LONGER SUPPORTED

sonusSonetPortAdmnDs3ModeOverride.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnDs3ModeOverride
sonusSonetPortAdmnDs3ModeOverride.description: This flag controls whether the mode and state of the Paths carried in an OC3 are modified when the mode and state of the OC3 is modified. If this flag is set to Enabled, the Path state and mode are not changed when the OC3 mode and state are changed.

sonusSonetPortAdmnStsXmtScramble.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnStsXmtScramble
sonusSonetPortAdmnStsXmtScramble.description: Controls whether the transmitted STS-N data stream is scrambled. If this flag is set to Enabled, the data is scrambled.

sonusSonetPortAdmnStsRcvDescramble.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnStsRcvDescramble
sonusSonetPortAdmnStsRcvDescramble.description: Controls whether the received STS-N data stream is descrambled. If this flag is set to Enabled, the data is descrambled.

sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmXmtScramble.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmXmtScramble
sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmXmtScramble.description: Controls whether the transmitted ATM payload data is scrambled. If this flag is set to Enabled, the data is scrambled. This object only pertains to interfaces carrying ATM.

sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmRcvDescramble.name: sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmRcvDescramble
sonusSonetPortAdmnAtmRcvDescramble.description: Controls whether the received ATM payload data is descrambled. If this flag is set to Enabled, the data is descrambled. This object only pertains to interfaces carrying ATM.

sonusSonetSectionThresholdTable.name: sonusSonetSectionThresholdTable
sonusSonetSectionThresholdTable.description: The Sonus SONET Section Threshold Table. This table adds objects to set the Performance Monitoring thresholds for generating a Threshold Crossing Alert.

sonusSonetSectionThresholdEntry.name: sonusSonetSectionThresholdEntry
sonusSonetSectionThresholdEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Section Threshold table.

sonusSonetSectionThresholdIfIndex.name: sonusSonetSectionThresholdIfIndex
sonusSonetSectionThresholdIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mCVs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mCVs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mCVs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Section layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mESs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mESs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Section layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSESs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSESs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Section layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSEFSs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSEFSs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold15mSEFSs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Section layer Severely Errored Frame Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hCVs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hCVs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hCVs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Section layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hESs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hESs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Section layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSESs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSESs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Section layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSEFSs.name: sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSEFSs
sonusSonetSectionThreshold24hSEFSs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Section layer Severely Errored Frame Seconds.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentTable
sonusSonetSectionCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Section Current table.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentEntry
sonusSonetSectionCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Section Current table.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentIfIndex.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetSectionCurrentIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentStatus.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentStatus
sonusSonetSectionCurrentStatus.description: This variable indicates the status of the interface. It is a bit map represented as a sum, therefore, it can represent multiple defects simultaneously. The sonetSectionNoDefect should be set if and only if no other flag is set. The various bit positions are: 1 sonetSectionNoDefect 2 sonetSectionLOS 4 sonetSectionLOF

sonusSonetSectionCurrentESs.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentESs
sonusSonetSectionCurrentESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentSESs.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentSESs
sonusSonetSectionCurrentSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentSEFSs.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentSEFSs
sonusSonetSectionCurrentSEFSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Framing Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionCurrentCVs.name: sonusSonetSectionCurrentCVs
sonusSonetSectionCurrentCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalTable.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalTable
sonusSonetSectionIntervalTable.description: The Sonus SONET Section Interval table.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalEntry.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalEntry
sonusSonetSectionIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Section Interval table.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalIfIndex.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalIfIndex
sonusSonetSectionIntervalIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalNumber.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalNumber
sonusSonetSectionIntervalNumber.description: The number 1 identifies the most recently completed 24 hour interval. In the future if more 24 hour intervals are supported, the interval identified by N is the interval immediately preceding the one identified by N-1.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalESs.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalESs
sonusSonetSectionIntervalESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalSESs.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalSESs
sonusSonetSectionIntervalSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalSEFSs.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalSEFSs
sonusSonetSectionIntervalSEFSs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Framing Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalCVs.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalCVs
sonusSonetSectionIntervalCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Section in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetSectionIntervalValidData.name: sonusSonetSectionIntervalValidData
sonusSonetSectionIntervalValidData.description: This variable indicates if the data for this interval is valid.

sonusSonetLineThresholdTable.name: sonusSonetLineThresholdTable
sonusSonetLineThresholdTable.description: The Sonus SONET Line Threshold Table. This table adds objects to set the Performance Monitoring thresholds for generating a Threshold Crossing Alert.

sonusSonetLineThresholdEntry.name: sonusSonetLineThresholdEntry
sonusSonetLineThresholdEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Line Threshold table.

sonusSonetLineThresholdIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLineThresholdIfIndex
sonusSonetLineThresholdIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetLineThreshold15mCVs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold15mCVs
sonusSonetLineThreshold15mCVs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Line layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetLineThreshold15mESs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold15mESs
sonusSonetLineThreshold15mESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Line layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetLineThreshold15mSESs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold15mSESs
sonusSonetLineThreshold15mSESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Line layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetLineThreshold15mUASs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold15mUASs
sonusSonetLineThreshold15mUASs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Line layer Unavailable Seconds.

sonusSonetLineThreshold24hCVs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold24hCVs
sonusSonetLineThreshold24hCVs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Line layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetLineThreshold24hESs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold24hESs
sonusSonetLineThreshold24hESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Line layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetLineThreshold24hSESs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold24hSESs
sonusSonetLineThreshold24hSESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Line layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetLineThreshold24hUASs.name: sonusSonetLineThreshold24hUASs
sonusSonetLineThreshold24hUASs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Line layer Unavailable Seconds.

sonusSonetLineCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentTable
sonusSonetLineCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Line Current table.

sonusSonetLineCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentEntry
sonusSonetLineCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Line Current table.

sonusSonetLineCurrentIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetLineCurrentIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetLineCurrentStatus.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentStatus
sonusSonetLineCurrentStatus.description: This variable indicates the status of the interface. It is a bit map represented as a sum, therefore, it can represent multiple defects simultaneously. The sonetLineNoDefect should be set if and only if no other flag is set. The various bit positions are: 1 sonetSectionNoDefect 2 sonetLineAIS 4 sonetLineRDI

sonusSonetLineCurrentESs.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentESs
sonusSonetLineCurrentESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineCurrentSESs.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentSESs
sonusSonetLineCurrentSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineCurrentUASs.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentUASs
sonusSonetLineCurrentUASs.description: The counter associated with the number of Unavailable Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineCurrentCVs.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentCVs
sonusSonetLineCurrentCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineCurrentFCs.name: sonusSonetLineCurrentFCs
sonusSonetLineCurrentFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalTable.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalTable
sonusSonetLineIntervalTable.description: The Sonus SONET Line Interval table.

sonusSonetLineIntervalEntry.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalEntry
sonusSonetLineIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Line Interval table.

sonusSonetLineIntervalIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalIfIndex
sonusSonetLineIntervalIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetLineIntervalNumber.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalNumber
sonusSonetLineIntervalNumber.description: The number 1 identifies the most recently completed 24 hour interval. In the future if more 24 hour intervals are supported, the interval identified by N is the interval immediately preceding the one identified by N-1.

sonusSonetLineIntervalESs.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalESs
sonusSonetLineIntervalESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalSESs.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalSESs
sonusSonetLineIntervalSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalUASs.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalUASs
sonusSonetLineIntervalUASs.description: The counter associated with the number of Unavailable Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalCVs.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalCVs
sonusSonetLineIntervalCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalFCs.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalFCs
sonusSonetLineIntervalFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the previous 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetLineIntervalValidData.name: sonusSonetLineIntervalValidData
sonusSonetLineIntervalValidData.description: This variable indicates if the data for this interval is valid.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentTable
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Far End Line Current table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentEntry
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Far End Line Current table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentIfIndex.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentESs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentESs
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentSESs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentSESs
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentUASs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentUASs
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentUASs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Unavailable Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentCVs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentCVs
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentFCs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentFCs
sonusSonetFarEndLineCurrentFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalTable.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalTable
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalTable.description: The Sonus SONET Far End Line Interval table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalEntry.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalEntry
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Far End Line Interval table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalIfIndex.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalIfIndex
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalNumber.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalNumber
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalNumber.description: The number 1 identifies the most recently completed 24 hour interval. In the future if more 24 hour intervals are supported, the interval identified by N is the interval immediately preceding the one identified by N-1.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalESs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalESs
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalSESs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalSESs
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalUASs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalUASs
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalUASs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Unavailable Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalCVs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalCVs
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalCVs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Coding Violations encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalFCs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalFCs
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Far End Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalValidData.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalValidData
sonusSonetFarEndLineIntervalValidData.description: This variable indicates if the data for this interval is valid.

sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentTable
sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Line Failure Current table.

sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentEntry
sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Line Failure Current table.

sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentFCs.name: sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentFCs
sonusSonetLineFailureCurrentFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 15 minute interval.

sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalTable.name: sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalTable
sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalTable.description: The Sonus SONET Line Failure Interval table.

sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalEntry.name: sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalEntry
sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Line Failure Interval table.

sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalIfIndex
sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalNumber.name: sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalNumber
sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalNumber.description: A number between 1 and 32, which identifies the interval for which the set of statistics is available. The number 1 identifies the most recently completed interval, and the interval identified by N is the interval immediately preceding the one identified by N-1.

sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalFCs.name: sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalFCs
sonusSonetLineFailureIntervalFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 15 minute interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentTable
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Far End Line Failure Current table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentEntry
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Far End Line Failure Current table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentIfInde.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentIfInde.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentFCs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentFCs
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureCurrentFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 15 minute interval.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalTable.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalTable
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalTable.description: The Sonus SONET Far End Line Failure Interval table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalEntry.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalEntry
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Far End Line Failure Interval table.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalIfInd.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalIfIndex
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalIfInd.description: The ifIndex assigned to this port when it was created. This will not change until the port is deleted.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalNumbe.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalNumber
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalNumbe.description: A number between 1 and 32, which identifies the interval for which the set of statistics is available. The number 1 identifies the most recently completed interval, and the interval identified by N is the interval immediately preceding the one identified by N-1.

sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalFCs.name: sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalFCs
sonusSonetFarEndLineFailureIntervalFCs.description: The counter associated with the number of Failures encountered by a SONET/SDH Line in the current 15 minute interval.

sonusSonetLayerTable.name: sonusSonetLayerTable
sonusSonetLayerTable.description: The SONET layer table. This table maps SONET Interface ifIndex to a shelf, slot, and port.

sonusSonetLayerEntry.name: sonusSonetLayerEntry
sonusSonetLayerEntry.description: An entry in the SONET layer table. This entry maps the ifIndex of the SONET Interface to a shelf, slot and port. A row is added to this table when a SONET port is created.

sonusSonetLayerIfIndex.name: sonusSonetLayerIfIndex
sonusSonetLayerIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this shelf, slot, and port when the SONET Interface was created.

sonusSonetLayerRowStatus.name: sonusSonetLayerRowStatus
sonusSonetLayerRowStatus.description: This object is used to create, delete, or modify a row in this table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTable.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTable
sonusSonetPathAdmnTable.description: The Sonus SONET Path Admn Table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnEntry.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnEntry
sonusSonetPathAdmnEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Path Admn table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnIfIndex.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnIfIndex
sonusSonetPathAdmnIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this path when it was created. This will not change until the path is deleted.

sonusSonetPathAdmnPortIndex.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnPortIndex
sonusSonetPathAdmnPortIndex.description: OC3 port index for this table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnPathIndex.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnPathIndex
sonusSonetPathAdmnPathIndex.description: STS1 path index for this table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnRowStatus.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnRowStatus
sonusSonetPathAdmnRowStatus.description: This object is used to create, delete, or modify a row in this table.

sonusSonetPathAdmnAction.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnAction
sonusSonetPathAdmnAction.description: The type of action to perform when a SONET path is taken out of service. The SONET path can be dried up, or it can be forced out of service.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTimeout.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTimeout
sonusSonetPathAdmnTimeout.description: The Dryup Timeout specifies the maximum amount of time to wait for all active calls to terminate on a SONET path before the path should be taken out-of-service.

sonusSonetPathAdmnStatAction.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnStatAction
sonusSonetPathAdmnStatAction.description: Initialize Performance Monitoring Statistics. A PM initialization action initiates one request for the action. Requests to initialize more than one group of statistics can be accomplished by OR-ing the appropriate bits (e.g., to initialize all 15 minute PM statistics, set bits 1 and 2). Reading this variable always returns zero.

sonusSonetPathAdmnRDIMode.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnRDIMode
sonusSonetPathAdmnRDIMode.description: The desired type of SONET port Path Remote Defect Indication to use. (1) normal - Use one-bit RDI-P signalling using bit 5 of G1. (2) enhanced - Use three-bit RDI-P (ERDI-P) using bits 5-7 of G1.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceState.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceState
sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceState.description: The desired state of SONET Path Trace. (1) enabled - Enables the generation of SONET Path Trace Messages in the J1 bytes of the STS Path overhead, and enables the reception and checking of received Path Trace Messages with the Expected Path Trace Message. (2) disabled - Transmits all zero's in the J1 bytes of the STS Path overhead, and disables the reception and checking of received Path Trace Messages with the Expected Path Trace Message.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceExpMsg.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceExpMsg
sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceExpMsg.description: The expected path trace string to be received on the SONET port in the J1 bytes of the STS Path overhead.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceXmtMsg.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceXmtMsg
sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceXmtMsg.description: The path trace string to be transmitted on the SONET port in the J1 bytes of the STS Path overhead.

sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceRcvMsg.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceRcvMsg
sonusSonetPathAdmnTraceRcvMsg.description: The path trace string received on the SONET port in the J1 bytes of the STS Path overhead.

sonusSonetPathAdmnOperStatus.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnOperStatus
sonusSonetPathAdmnOperStatus.description: The actual status of the Sonet path. Path is Up if it is administratively in service and there are no line failures or hardware failures. Path is Down if it is administratively in service and there are line failures or hardware failures, or if it is administratively out of service. Path is DryingUp if it is administratively out of service and is drying up (no new calls, still carrying in-progress calls) THE OTHER VALUES ARE NO LONGER SUPPORTED.

sonusSonetPathAdmnDs3ModeOverride.name: sonusSonetPathAdmnDs3ModeOverride
sonusSonetPathAdmnDs3ModeOverride.description: This flag controls whether the mode and state of the DS3 carried in the Path are modified when the mode and state of the Path is modified. If this flag is set to Enabled, the DS3 state and mode are not changed when the Path mode and state are changed.

sonusSonetPathThresholdTable.name: sonusSonetPathThresholdTable
sonusSonetPathThresholdTable.description: The Sonus SONET Path Threshold Table. This table adds objects to set the Performance Monitoring thresholds for generating a Threshold Crossing Alert.

sonusSonetPathThresholdEntry.name: sonusSonetPathThresholdEntry
sonusSonetPathThresholdEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Path Threshold table.

sonusSonetPathThresholdIfIndex.name: sonusSonetPathThresholdIfIndex
sonusSonetPathThresholdIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this path when it was created. This will not change until the path is deleted.

sonusSonetPathThresholdPathIndex.name: sonusSonetPathThresholdPathIndex
sonusSonetPathThresholdPathIndex.description: STS1 path index for this table.

sonusSonetPathThreshold15mCVs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold15mCVs
sonusSonetPathThreshold15mCVs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Path layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetPathThreshold15mESs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold15mESs
sonusSonetPathThreshold15mESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Path layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetPathThreshold15mSESs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold15mSESs
sonusSonetPathThreshold15mSESs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Path layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetPathThreshold15mUASs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold15mUASs
sonusSonetPathThreshold15mUASs.description: Threshold for 15 minute interval Path layer Unavailable Seconds.

sonusSonetPathThreshold24hCVs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold24hCVs
sonusSonetPathThreshold24hCVs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Path layer Coding Violations.

sonusSonetPathThreshold24hESs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold24hESs
sonusSonetPathThreshold24hESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Path layer Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetPathThreshold24hSESs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold24hSESs
sonusSonetPathThreshold24hSESs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Path layer Severely Errored Seconds.

sonusSonetPathThreshold24hUASs.name: sonusSonetPathThreshold24hUASs
sonusSonetPathThreshold24hUASs.description: Threshold for 24 hour interval Path layer Unavailable Seconds.

sonusSonetPathCurrentTable.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentTable
sonusSonetPathCurrentTable.description: The Sonus SONET Path Current table.

sonusSonetPathCurrentEntry.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentEntry
sonusSonetPathCurrentEntry.description: An entry in the Sonus SONET Path Current table.

sonusSonetPathCurrentIfIndex.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentIfIndex
sonusSonetPathCurrentIfIndex.description: The ifIndex assigned to this path when it was created. This will not change until the path is deleted.

sonusSonetPathCurrentPathIndex.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentPathIndex
sonusSonetPathCurrentPathIndex.description: STS1 path index for this table.

sonusSonetPathCurrentWidth.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentWidth
sonusSonetPathCurrentWidth.description: A value that indicates the type of the SONET/SDH Path. For SONET, the assigned types are the STS-Nc SPEs, where N = 1, 3, 12, 24, and 48. STS-1 is equal to 51.84 Mbps. For SDH, the assigned types are the STM-Nc VCs, where N = 1, 4, and 16.

sonusSonetPathCurrentStatus.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentStatus
sonusSonetPathCurrentStatus.description: This variable indicates the status of the interface. It is a bit map represented as a sum, therefore, it can represent multiple defects simultaneously. The sonetPathNoDefect should be set if and only if no other flag is set. The various bit positions are: 1 sonetPathNoDefect 2 sonetPathSTSLOP 4 sonetPathSTSAIS 8 sonetPathSTSRDI 16 sonetPathUnequiped 32 sonetPathSignalLabelMismatch

sonusSonetPathCurrentESs.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentESs
sonusSonetPathCurrentESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Path in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetPathCurrentSESs.name: sonusSonetPathCurrentSESs
sonusSonetPathCurrentSESs.description: The counter associated with the number of Severely Errored Seconds encountered by a SONET/SDH Path in the current 24 hour interval.

sonusSonetNextIndex.name: sonusSonetNextIndex
sonusSonetNextIndex.description: The next valid index to use when creating an entry in the sonusSonetTable.

sonusSonetAdminStatus.name: sonusSonetAdminStatus
sonusSonetAdminStatus.description: The administrative status of a Sonet port. EnabledInService means the port configuration is applied and the port is available to carry calls. EnabledOutOfService means the port configuration is applied and the port is not available to carry calls. Disabled means the port configuration is not applied and the port is not available to carry calls. DryingUp means the port is still carrying in-progress calls but is not available for new calls. Value deleted is NO LONGER SUPPORTED.

sonusSonetOperStatus.name: sonusSonetOperStatus
sonusSonetOperStatus.description: Operational status of the Sonet port. Port is inService if the admin state is enabled and the admin mode is in service. Port is outOfService if admin state is enabled, admin mode is out of service, and port is no longer carrying calls (dried up). Port is dryingUp if admin state is enabled, admin mode is out of service, and port is drying up (no new calls, still carrying in-progress calls). Port is inServiceDown if admin state is enabled, admin mode is in service, but physical link is not available due to alarm condition. Port is outOfServiceDown if admin state is enabled, admin mode is out of service, but physical link is not available due to alarm condition. Port is disabled if admin state is disabled, admin mode is out of service, and port is no longer carrying calls (dried up).

sonusSonetOutOfServiceReason.name: sonusSonetOutOfServiceReason
sonusSonetOutOfServiceReason.description: Reason the Sonet port/path went out of service.

sonusSonetPortAdminStatusNotification.name: sonusSonetPortAdminStatusNotification
sonusSonetPortAdminStatusNotification.description: This trap indicates the Sonet port's administrative status has changed due to an operator-initiated command. Possible admin status is EnabledInService, EnabledOutOfService, Disabled, and DryingUp.

sonusSonetPortOperStatusNotification.name: sonusSonetPortOperStatusNotification
sonusSonetPortOperStatusNotification.description: NO LONGER SUPPORTED. This trap indicates the Sonet port's operational status has changed.

sonusSonetLineAlarmNotification.name: sonusSonetLineAlarmNotification
sonusSonetLineAlarmNotification.description: This trap indicates the line Section/Line-layer alarm state of the Sonet port has changed.

sonusSonetLineThresholdCrossNotification.name: sonusSonetLineThresholdCrossNotification
sonusSonetLineThresholdCrossNotification.description: This trap indicates that a Section/Line-layer performance monitoring threshold has been crossed.

sonusSonetPathAdminStatusNotification.name: sonusSonetPathAdminStatusNotification
sonusSonetPathAdminStatusNotification.description: This trap indicates the Sonet path's administrative status has changed due to an operator-initiated command. Possible admin status is EnabledInService, EnabledOutOfService, Disabled, and DryingUp.

sonusSonetPathOperStatusNotification.name: sonusSonetPathOperStatusNotification
sonusSonetPathOperStatusNotification.description: NO LONGER SUPPORTED. This trap indicates the Sonet path's operational status has changed.

sonusSonetPathAlarmNotification.name: sonusSonetPathAlarmNotification
sonusSonetPathAlarmNotification.description: This trap indicates the line Path-layer alarm state of the Sonet path has changed.

sonusSonetPathThresholdCrossNotification.name: sonusSonetPathThresholdCrossNotification
sonusSonetPathThresholdCrossNotification.description: This trap indicates that a Path-layer performance monitoring threshold has been crossed.

sonusSonetPortOutOfServiceNotification.name: sonusSonetPortOutOfServiceNotification
sonusSonetPortOutOfServiceNotification.description: This trap indicates the Sonet port went out of service. Reason indicates why the port went out of service. Possible reasons include admin or hardware failure.

sonusSonetPathOutOfServiceNotification.name: sonusSonetPathOutOfServiceNotification
sonusSonetPathOutOfServiceNotification.description: This trap indicates the Sonet path went out of service. Reason indicates why the port went out of service. Possible reasons include admin or hardware failure.
